title: Profile

posts.text: Going to see my Boys live! Their trash performance isn't worth my money, but God finds a way!
posts.name: Abertam

posts.text: I swear KXLQ ALWAYS has my old jams on
posts.name: Abertam

posts.text: If your boyfriend's gun isn't semi-auto or a shotgun, do your periods sync up?
posts.name: Abertam

posts.text: When I die, I want the Boys in Blue to be my pallbearers so they can let me down one last time
Gonna take them to the bar to get their first drink and watch my other boys break their losing streak
posts.name: Abertam

posts.text: So proud of my boys for graduating high school today
posts.name: Abertam
